mapper.select: select substring_index(prodName,' ',1) as brand,a.*, b.originalFile from product as a , prodImg as b where a.prodNo= #{prodNo} and b.prodNo = #{prodNo} limit 0,1
select substring_index(prodName,' ',1) as brand,a.*, b.originalFile from product as a , prodImg as b where a.prodNo=b.prodNo order by a.prodPutDate desc limit 0,6
select b.*,a.originalFile from prodImg as a, product as b where a.prodNo = b.prodNo order by prodNo desc limit #{startNum},#{postPerPage}
mapper.update: update product set reviewCount = reviewCount + 1 where prodNo = #{prodNo}
